examples.example: 愿大家每一天都过得平安快乐。

translate.english: Wish everyone a safe and happy every day.

examples.example: 愿所有人都能一生平安顺遂。

translate.english: Wish all people can have a safe and smooth life all their lives.

examples.example: 无论我们身在何处，都愿大家平安顺遂。

translate.english: No matter where we are, I wish everyone safe and smooth.
